first_translate: that lady...
it seems like she’s staring right at me instead of siegren...!
it seems like she’s staring right at me instead of siegren...!
something feels off about this.

hangle: 원작이랑 또 흐름이 달라진 거 아냐?!
first_translate: isn’t this different from how things went down in the original story?!
my people.
I’m glad you could make it here today.
finally.

hangle: 여기 있는 모두가 기쁜 소식을 들었으리라 믿는다.
first_translate: I believe everyone has heard the wonderful news by now.
the glorious bloodline of our imperial house...

hangle: 북방에서 지대한 공을 세웠다는 것을 말이지.
first_translate: ...has achieved great deeds up north.
come forth,
my proud son, siegren.
now that you’re done ignoring me for years on end,

hangle: 이 자리에서 네가 세운 공적을 모두에게 보여다오.
first_translate: show us what you’ve accomplished before these guests.
as you wish, father.
this is the heart of the dragon I slew.
I shall present it as a gift to his majesty, ruler of the empire.
ooh! look at that!

hangle: 아무리 강한 마물이라도 소용이 없다는 걸 보여주는구나.
first_translate: even the strongest monsters are no match against the mighty bloodline of our empire!
so that’s really a dragon’s heart...
and there you have it, my people.
witness the greatness of our empire and its royal house!
he keeps emphasizing “bloodline.”

hangle: 그러니 역사에 남을 공을 세운 짐의 아들에게,
first_translate: to commemorate such a historic achievement made by my own flesh and blood,
I hereby restore him back to his rightful place.
today,

hangle: 이 자리에서 시그렌을 정식 황자로 책봉하겠다!
first_translate: in front of all of you gathered here, I declare siegren as an official member of the imperial family!
congratulations, your highness!
may fortune smile upon the new prince!
wow...

hangle: 내심 싫은 사람도 많을 텐데, 사회생활 잘하는군.
first_translate: a lot of them must despise him deep inside, but they play their parts well.
on the other hand,
the crown prince over there...

hangle: 표정 관리가 안 될 정도로 불만이 많은 모양이야.
first_translate: ...looks too upset to keep himself composed anymore.
of course, if someone else becomes part of the imperial family,
his position might become threatened.
long live the new prince!
if everything goes according to plan,
he’ll turn into one of those minor villains who harasses the main characters...
throw that bastard behind bars immediately!!!
throw that bastard behind bars immediately!!!
throw that bastard behind bars immediately!!!
but I guess we'll leave that to siegren and eunice.
siegren!
fiona?
y-you did amazing out there!
y-you did amazing out there!
y-you did amazing out there!
good job, everyone...
how did you manage to slay a dragon?
you truly are brave!
duke hailon,
when exactly did you meet the young prince?
and who is the girl next to him?
I will reveal that information during the meeting of the five founding families.

hangle: 개국 공신 가문 다섯이 모이는 회의에서만 밝힌다니.
first_translate: only then will he tell us more about her identity?
then maybe she really was born out of wedlock...
excuse me.
we can hear every single thing you say.

hangle: 아벨, 저 잠시 바람 좀 쐬고 올게요.
first_translate: abel, I need some fresh air.
go ahead.
whew...
that felt nice.
I didn’t expect myself to receive so much attention.

hangle: 다들 남의 일에 관심이 참 많다니까.
first_translate: people sure love meddling in others’ business.
huh...? who’s coming toward me?
livy,
stop playing hard to get and come around already.
can you please call me miss priscilla...
...instead of using nicknames?
priscilla?

hangle: 도도한 것도 좋지만 너무 뻣뻣하게 굴면 재미없다고.
first_translate: being arrogant is fine, but being stiff isn’t fun either.
that wasn’t very polite of you.
wait, what?!
look! it’s the crown prince and livia priscilla!

hangle: 내 맘에 들면 황태자비가 될 수도 있는데~
first_translate: if she catches his eye, she might actually become the future crown princess!
your highness,
I’d better go now.
what do you mean--

hangle: 황태자인 내 허락도 없이 멋대로 어디를 가?
first_translate: do you think you may simply walk away without getting permission first?
all this time, I tolerated you because I found you beautiful!

hangle: 아까 프리실라 공작님께서 영애를 급히 찾으셨어요.
first_translate: earlier, duke priscilla came looking for you urgently.

hangle: 저도 공작님을 도와 같이 영애를 찾고 있던 참이었답니다.
first_translate: I was helping him find you when I ran across you two together.
who dares interrupt--?
ah!
I had no idea you were also here, your highness!
greetings, little sun of the empire.
I am fiona hailon.
hailon...?

hangle: 아무리 황태자라도 헤일론 가문을 건들긴 쉽지 않지.
first_translate: not even the crown prince would dare cross paths with the hailons.
thank you, father!

hangle: 그러고 보니, 아버지가 제게 할 말이 있다고 하셨죠.
first_translate: right, father said he wanted to talk to me earlier.
I almost forgot.
thanks for finding me,
lady fiona.
she really is gorgeous.

hangle: 백 번이고 천 번이고 찾으러 올게요!
first_translate: I'd gladly search for you again a hundred times or more!
then...
with that said, excuse me, your highness.
what?
sh*t!!

hangle: 전하께서 따라올지도 모르니까, 조금만 더 팔짱 끼고 걸어요.
first_translate: let’s hold hands while walking since his highness might follow after us.
also...
I picked this up for you earlier.
thank you.
they suit you perfectly!!
shall we head home now?
okay.
hmm...

hangle: 황태자는 정말 곤란했지만 예상 밖의 인연을 얻었네.
first_translate: dealing with the crown prince was troublesome, but I gained something unexpected in return.
the brutal magician of house hailon...!
